title: Bug 49299: Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 discrepancy in custom cookie name and URL rewriting
description: The description states that Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 mentions that a custom cookie name affects URL rewriting. However, in the current trunk, this is not the case as the default 'jsessionid' is used instead. The bug report includes a war file that demonstrates this issue.
OB: The Servlet 3.0 specification, specifically in ch.7.1.1, incorrectly states that a custom cookie name affects URL rewriting.
EB: The Servlet 3.0 specification should be amended to reflect the correct behavior that the default 'jsessionid' is always used for URL rewriting regardless of the custom cookie name.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Deploy the attached war file (cookiename.war). 2. Access the application at http://localhost:8080/cookiename/.
